coreAttributes.name: Vitality Seed
coreAttributes.description: A large seed that brims with arcane energy. Holding it, you feel the power as a soft warmth, like gentle sunlight.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(npc.getBody().getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_PLANT)

[style.colourDisabled([npc.NameIsFull] already a plant creature, so nothing happens...)]

#ELSEIF(npc.getBody().getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_SLIME)

[style.colourDisabled([npc.NameIsFull] a slime, so nothing happens...)]

#ELSEIF(npc.getBody().getBodyMaterial()!=BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH)

[style.colourDisabled([npc.NameIsFull] an elemental, so nothing happens...)]

#ELSE [#npc.setBodyMaterial(BODY_MATERIAL_PLANT)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] gently [npc.verb(licks)] the glowing seed. A gentle glow spreads from it to cover [npc.her] entire body...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(offer)] the glowing seed to [npc2.name]. When [npc2.name] curiously [npc2.verb(pokes)] it, its gentle glow grows to cover [npc2.her] body...
